com.googlecode.lanterna.terminal.Terminal.ResizeListener

    Package Description
    com.googlecode.lanterna.terminal  

    • Uses of Terminal.ResizeListener in com.googlecode.lanterna.terminal

      Methods in com.googlecode.lanterna.terminal with parameters of type Terminal.ResizeListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AbstractTerminal.addResizeListener(Terminal.ResizeListener listener) 
      void Terminal.addResizeListener(Terminal.ResizeListener listener)
      Adds a ResizeListener to be called when the terminal has changed size.
      void AbstractTerminal.removeResizeListener(Terminal.ResizeListener listener) 
      void Terminal.removeResizeListener(Terminal.ResizeListener listener)
      Removes a ResizeListener from the list of listeners to be notified when the terminal has changed size
